hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Umar that:the Messenger of Allah enjoined that Sadaqatul Fitr should be given before the people go out to pray. (One of the narratorsP: Ibn Bazi'said: "Zakatul-Fitr)

chapter.ara-name: باب الْوَقْتِ الَّذِي يُسْتَحَبُّ أَنْ تُؤَدَّى صَدَقَةُ الْفِطْرِ فِيهِ
chapter.eng-name: The Time When It Is Mustahab To Pay Sadaqatul Fitr
